question: Which Indian company has partnered with Qualcomm to develop a 5 G RAN product?
explanation:
Jio has partnered with Qualcomm and indigenously developed a 5G RAN (Radio Access Network) product.
Reliance Jio Infocomm will use the technology of Qualcomm to develop the product which has achieved over 1 Gbps throughput. India has entered the elite club of countries which display 1 Gbps speeds for 5G customers.
